description: This is a Python script implementing an interactive SQLite database shell with commands for listing tables, showing schemas, describing tables, and executing SQL queries.

methods.name: print_help
methods.description: Prints help information about shell commands.

methods.name: list_tables
methods.description: Lists all tables in the SQLite database.

methods.name: show_schema
methods.description: Shows CREATE statements for tables, or all tables if no specific table is provided.

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Displays the structure of a specified table.

methods.name: execute_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and displays results or affected rows.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function running the interactive shell loop.
